value.title: What devices does GoMirror support
value.content:
For the moment, GoMirror fully supports:

  • LG SmartTV with webOS
  • Samsung SmartTV with Tizen tvOS
  • Roku devices that support 4K
  • Kodi TV that has UPnP configured (Mac & PC)

kodi.title: Kodi TV
kodi.content: To see how to configure your computers (Mac & PC) to works with GoMirror, please see videos below

value.title: How to mirror your iPhone and iPad screens to your TV
value.content:
You can mirror your iPhone or iPad screens to your TVs by doing follows:

  • Connect your TV to your home wifi network
  • Connect your iPhone or iPad to the same wifi network (it must be the same)
  • From GoMirror Home screen, tap `Connect` button to open Connect screen
  • From Connect screen, select the TV you want to connect.

  • If your TV does not display, try followings:

    1. Verify that they share the same wifi network (e.g 2G and 5G are different)
    2. Plug the TV power cable out, wait for 30s then plug it in again.
    3. Restart your iPhone/iPad
    4. Restart the wifi router

kodi.content: Please note that at the moment, GoMirror only supports LG TVs with webOS, Samsung TV with Tizen tvOS, Roku devices that support 4K, and Kodi TV (Mac, PC, Linux app). For other TV make models, since not fully tested, GoMirror's compatibility is limited, depends on the TVs' hardware and IO protocols

value.title: How to mirror your iPhone and iPad screens to Mac computers
value.content: You can easily update GoMirror from your Apple Store. Please note if you received a message that isn't supported by your version of GoMirror, you'll need to update GoMirror. We encourage you to always use the latest version of GoMirror. Latest versions contain the newest features and bug fixes.

kodi.title: iPhone & iPad
kodi.content: Go to the App Store and search for GoMirror. Tap UPDATE next to GoMirror.

value.title: What can I do with Music Cast
value.content:
The Music Cast feature help you to:

  • Import your music from your cloud storage services
  • Cast them to your TV

value.title: What kind of cloud storage services does Music Cast support
value.content:
For now, GoMirror Music Cast supports almost every popular cloud storgage services, including:

  • iOS iCloud Files (default)
  • Dropbox
  • Google Drive
  • Microsoft OneDrive
  • Box (box.com)

value.title: How can I import music from Google Drive to GoMirror
value.content:
In order to import music from Google Drive (or Dropbox) into GoMirror, please follow:

  • Install Google Drive app on your iPhone/iPad
  • Open Google Drive (Dropbox), login with your account
  • When casting music, select Import to open the Document Picker screen
  • On the bottom menu, find Browse button and tap it to return to the main screen
  • On the Locations section, lookup for Google Drive (or Dropbox) icon, tap it to browse the cloud storage screen

  • If you don't see it in the Locations:

    1. Tap the … icon (edit button) on the top right corner
    2. Tap ”Edit”
    3. Find your services you want to add and turn it on

    4. Still not clear how to do it? Please watch the following instruction video:

value.title: How can I import music from cloud storage services to GoMirror
value.content:
In order to import music from cloud storage services into GoMirror, please follow:

  • Install the cloud service (Google Drive, Dropbox, Box...) app on your iPhone/iPad
  • Open the cloud service app (Google Drive, Dropbox, Box...), login with your account
  • When casting music, select Import to open the Document Picker screen
  • On the bottom menu, find Browse button and tap it to return to the main screen
  • On the Locations section, lookup for Google Drive (or Dropbox) icon, tap it to browse the cloud storage screen

  • If you don't see it in the Locations:

    1. Tap the … icon (edit button) on the top right corner
    2. Tap ”Edit”
    3. Find your services you want to add and turn it on

    4. Still not clear how to do it? Please watch the following instruction video:

value.title: What features does Slideshow support
value.content:
The Slideshow feature helps you to:

  • Help users to create slideshows from photos they like and music they love.
  • Create a slideshow from scratch or Customize one from our template gallery
  • Cast them to your TVs

value.title: What kind of soundtracks can I use when making slideshows
value.content:
When making slideshows, you can use:

  • The fully licensed soundtracks included within the app
  • Audio from your cloud storage services (Dropbox, Google Drive ...)

value.title: What kind of cloud storage services does GoMirror Slideshow support
value.content:
For now, GoMirror Slideshow supports almost every popular cloud storgage services, including:

  • iOS iCloud Files (default)
  • Dropbox
  • Google Drive
  • Microsoft OneDrive
  • Box (box.com)

value.title: How to import soundtrack from Google Drive or Dropbox when making slideshows
value.content:
In order to import music from Google Drive (or Dropbox) into GoMirror, please follow:

  • Install Google Drive app on your iPhone/iPad
  • Open Google Drive (Dropbox), login with your account
  • When editing soundtrack, select ”Import” to open the ”Document Picker” screen
  • On the bottom menu, find ”Browse” button and tap it to return to the main screen
  • On the ”Locations” section, lookup for Google Drive (or Dropbox) icon, tap it to browse the cloud storage screen

  • If you don't see it in the ”Locations”:

    • Tap the ”...” icon (edit button) on the top right corner
    • Tap &rdquoEdit&rdquo
    • Find your services you want to add and turn it on
  • Still not clear how to do it? Please watch the following instruction video:
